result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Akeem Shamar Cole

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: $120.00 restitution to victim Jodi R. was entered/paid on 14CF3173.

Defendant Akeem Shamar Cole in court with attorney Joseph Thomas Domask.  Defendant Akeem Shamar Cole in custody.  Antonella Aleman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Parties are in Court as to sentencing in #14CF3173.  Matters were resolved globally, this case was dismissed and read-in for sentencing purposes.  State submits restitution worksheet.  Court sets restitution in the stipulated amount of $120 payable to victim Jodi R.  

Filed, Crime Victim Impact Statement
Filed, Restitution Worksheet
Bail refund
4/11/16 bail refund notice mailed to surety.

Defendant Akeem S Cole in court with attorney Joseph Thomas Domask.  Defendant Akeem S Cole in custody.  Antonella Aleman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Matter is scheduled for final pretrial today.  Defendant has additional matters scheduled today.  Parties have reached a global resolution as to all matters.  Defendant changes plea to guilty in cases 14CF3173 & 16CF52.  On motion of the State, Court orders BOTH COUNTS in this case DISMISSED & READ-IN for purposes of sentencing.  4/18/16 jury trial date is vacated.

Attorney Joseph Thomas Domask in court, defendant Akeem Shamar Cole not in court, in custody.  Antonella Aleman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Matter scheduled for final pretrial conference.  Counsel joinlty requests additional final pretrial conference date, matter may resolve.  Matter remains scheduled for jury trial on 4/18/16 at 9:30am.  Final pre-trial scheduled for April 5, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Status Update, filed.

Defendant Akeem Shamar Cole in court with attorney Joseph Thomas Domask.  Antonella Aleman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Matter is in trial posture.  Final pre-trial scheduled for March 10, 2016 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for April 18, 2016 at 09:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Report, filed.
Justice Point Pretrial Report, filed.

Defendant Akeem S Cole in court with attorney Joseph Thomas Domask.  Antonella Aleman appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Counsel was recently appointed and is requesting status date to obtain discovery.  Status conference scheduled for November 19, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Akeem S Cole not in court, defendant in custody.  Megan Marie Williamson for Antonella Aleman appeared for the State of Wisconsin. OPD did not recieve notice to appoint new counsel, matter is adjourned for status conference. OPD appointment secretary notified of new date.  Status conference scheduled for October 7, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Report, filed.

Defendant reported back to court and provided the court with documentation that he does qualify for public defender representation. Case adjourned for status of counsel.  Status conference scheduled for 09-21-2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Akeem Shamar Cole in court.  Antonella Aleman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case called and passed. Court instructed the defendant to report to the public defenders office to have them determine if he qualifies for representation.
Justice Point Pretrial Report, filed.
Justice Point Violation Report, filed. Court takes no action.
Justice Point Pretrial Report, filed.

Defendant Akeem S Cole in court with attorney Eric M. Hailstock.  Antonella Aleman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Matter is scheduled for status conference, Court holds conference with counsel in chambers off the record.  Matter continues on the record.  Court admonishes defendant re: late appearance.  Court hears argument re: Attorney Hailstock's request to be removed as counsel of record.  Court GRANTS motion to withdraw forthwith. Counsel to notify OPD for reappointment of counsel. Court will NOT grant any additional motions to withdraw for the same reason. Court hears argument re: Justice Point violation. Court takes no action at this time. Matter is adjourned for status conference on 9/10/15 at 8:30am in br. 35.

JusticePoint Violation Report (7-20-15 missed telephone contact), filed.  Defendant reported for office visit for 7-27-15.

*Branch 07 in jury trial/violation not addressed, defendant not present*

Defendant Akeem Shamar Cole in court with attorney Eric M. Hailstock.  Antonella Aleman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case will remain calendared.   All parties notified as of August 03, 2015 this case is assigned to Judge Rosa, Branch 35, in room 629 of the courthouse.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Milwaukee County Pretrial Services Violation Report, received and filed.  Court takes no action.

Attorney Eric M. Hailstock in court, defendant Akeem Shamar Cole not in court, in custody.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 7.  Status conference scheduled for 07-01-2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Attorney Eric M. Hailstock in court, defendant Akeem Shamar Cole not in court, in custody.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant has picked up new charges.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 7.  Status conference scheduled for 05-04-2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Milwaukee County Pretrial Services Violation Report, received and filed.  Court takes no action.

Defendant Akeem Shamar Cole in court with attorney Eric M. Hailstock.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 7.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for 04-10-2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Akeem Shamar Cole in court with attorney Eric M. Hailstock.  Randy P. Sitxzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  HMP
  Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Thomas McAdams, Branch 07.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty. Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference to Branch 07.  Scheduling conference scheduled for March 23, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Court orders forfeiture of cash bond to be reinstated.

Defendant Akeem Shamar Cole in court.  Megan Carmody for Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant appears approximately 11:00 a.m. Defendant is admonished for appearing late before the Court.  
COURT ORDERED BENCH WARRANT WITHDRAWN/RESCINDED.  WARRANT IN FILE.  Court ordered case to be scheduled for Preliminary Hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Cash bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 500.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE JUDGE ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.

Attorney Eric M. Hailstock in court.  Ron Dague for Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case is called on the record at 9:30 a.m. 
The defendant having failed to appear, the court ordered a bench warrant to issue, any bond forfeited and Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification by the Clerk of Circuit Court.

Filed, Justice Point Pretrial Program Report dated 2/25/15.
css

Defendant Akeem Shamar Cole in court.  Ron Dague for Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defense Counsel did not appear or contact the court.  State did have an officer present. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for Preliminary Hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 26, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Filed, Justice Point Pretrial Program Report dated 2/19/15.

15RM007390  Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
02-12-2015
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Jodi R. or Kenneta L.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings. Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Akeem Shamar Cole in court with attorney Jamie Francis Cimpl-Wiemer.  Defendant Akeem Shamar Cole in custody.  Ronald Dague appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  HMP
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge McAdams, Branch 7.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings. Defense entered a plea of NOT GUILTY to count 1.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 20, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
